title: When was the website created? - Quora

response.answer_text: The link is a snapshot of the CERN site, the first website, as of November 1992. The Web was publicly announced (via a posting to the Usenet newsgroup alt.hypertext) on August 6, 1991. Originally Tim Berners-Lee's web catalog at CERN. Paul Kunz from SLAC visited Tim Berners-Lee at CERN in September 1991.
